body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to CarPro, your trusted car dealership. My name is Gregory Scott. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Maria. How may I assist you today? Can you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Maria. And may I also have your email address so I can update you on your inquiry?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is maria.johnson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information, Maria. Now, could you please describe the issue you are experiencing with the shipping process?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm relieved to say that I received my vehicle in excellent condition and on time. Your team did a fantastic job!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear, Maria! I'm glad our team could ensure a smooth delivery. Thank you for choosing CarPro. If you have any more questions or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
